fields.name: Second Harvest
fields.description: Second Harvest is a food bank that works to end hunger through community partnerships, food rescue, and distribution to those in need.

fields.name: Charity Water
fields.description: Charity Water is a non-profit organization bringing clean and safe drinking water to people in developing countries.
fields.impact_metric: People served with clean water for a year

fields.name: Water for People
fields.description: Water for People is working to create a world where everyone has access to safe water and sanitation services that last forever.
fields.impact_metric: People served with clean water for a year

fields.name: Blood:Water
fields.description: Blood: Water partners with African grassroots organizations to address the HIV/AIDS and water crises.
fields.impact_metric: People served with clean water & HIV/AIDS support for a year

fields.name: YMCA
fields.description: The YMCA is a worldwide organization that offers a wide variety of programs aimed at youth development, healthy living, and social responsibility.

fields.name: Habitat for Humanity
fields.description: Habitat for Humanity is a nonprofit organization that helps families build and improve places to call home.
fields.impact_metric: Families served with new or improved housing

fields.name: World Central Kitchen
fields.description: World Central Kitchen is a non-profit organization devoted to providing meals in the wake of natural disasters and other crises.
